ygData.subject: items site?
ygData.msgSnippet: Wow, this email list still lives! I ve got a question for you.  Do you use a site to see what items are available?  Which one?  How could it be better?  Do you
ygData.messageBody:
Wow, this email list still lives!

I've got a question for you. Do you use a site to see what items are
available? Which one? How could it be better? Do you care about news on
an items site, or just the items? Would it need quests listed for quest for
items, entirely, or just starting point? List of Mob it comes from?

My reason for asking: I'm thinking about making one, and if I do, I want it
to be THE items site to go to. I've actually already got the database
designed, I just need to work on inputting info and designing the site
layout. I could have a preview(not all items) up in 2 days or less if I get
enough response.
-----Original Message-----
From: suzkim@... [mailto:suzkim@...]
Sent: Sunday, October 17, 1999 5:24 AM
To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] One hand or two?


Matt-
I have a 30th level barbarian warrior on Veeshan. I can only tell you what
I've chosen
Max out 1hs, 2hs, taunt, kick, slam/bash and I am working on archery
(this has helped me take down runners).

Some have said take up piercing. When you get duel attack and duel weild
only for the fact that a piercing weapon is faster and will help max these
skills out.

I find that 1hs with duel weild is more effective in certain circumstances
and then 2hs in another. 1hs gives you speed of attack. 2hs is good for
greatest impact (recently got a crit hit of 100.. now that was sweet). If
you use a 2hs or 1hs will also depend on your group make up. I do carry all
my weapons with me so at times will switch depending on the circumstance.

All my reading and such have said to keep both maxed out. Some reasons are
the performance of the weapon others for the variety of weapons you can use.
I didn't work on my 2hs until I was at the 28th level and it was very
painful to max it out.

Good luck!

Az

Matthew Horne wrote:

G'day my name is Kalroth.. a level 7 dwarf warrior on the solusek ro
serverMy question is whether one hand or two hand slash is better for a
warrior Hope you can help me , thanks
